archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0647
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable customer accounts to be allocated to profiles automatically and manually

properties.value: Can you please explain role of customer profiles in Collections solution? What kind of profiles do you have? Requirement clear Manualy change of profile should not be overriden by automated process

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
